channel.title: How to make a jar from your client -728-
channel.description:
ok things you will need: -eclipse -a client open eclipse and right click and new java project [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z408/ruud8/1.png[/img]
and do this [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z408/ruud8/2.png[/img]
now your client is added to eclipse rightclick on the client folder in eclipse and then select export [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z408/ruud8/3.png[/img]
click on folder java then JAR file click then on next [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z408/ruud8/4.png[/img]
select your client and your destination then click on next [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z408/ruud8/5.png[/img]
then click again on next [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z408/ruud8/6.png[/img]
then click on browse then select loader then click on finish [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z408/ruud8/7.png[/img]
close eclipse and open the jar with winrar [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z408/ruud8/8.png[/img]
open META-INF [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z408/ruud8/9.png[/img]
then open manifest.mf with notepad [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z408/ruud8/10.png[/img]
replace the code with http://pastebin.com/WvmsSw6p [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z408/ruud8/11.png[/img]
save it and close it now open the .jar and tada youre done [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z408/ruud8/12.png[/img]

item.title: How to make a jar from your client -728-
item.dc:creator: @ruud123 ruud123
item.description:
@ruud123 wrote:

ok things you will need:
-eclipse
-a client
open eclipse and right click and new java project

and do this

now your client is added to eclipse rightclick on the client folder in eclipse and then select export

click on folder java then JAR file click then on next

select your client and your destination then click on next

then click again on next

then click on browse then select loader then click on finish

close eclipse and open the jar with winrar

open META-INF

then open manifest.mf with notepad

replace the code with http://pastebin.com/WvmsSw6p

save it and close it now open the .jar and tada youre done

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a jar from your client -728-
